topic.title: Which tab to pull to quickly remove body armor of LEO/military
topic.body:
Now that I got LEO's attention with that title:

It is a little known secret that the Israeli and American militares have backdoors to every computer and smartphone. The secret agents with access to the terminals that let one see the screen and keystrokes of any target are often corrupt criminals, thugs and themselves terrorists who instead of preventing terror attacks use their position to enrich themselves at the expense of innocents.


Technically it isn't hacking, because the hardware leaks data to the military by design and there are no firewall logs to prove that it is happening.

I will make sure this become a widespread knowledge - unless, unless, tick, tock.

topic.title: All AMD Processors Since Phenom II Have BadBIOS Circuitry That Leaks to the Military
topic.body:
Title gives my conclusion from empirical events I witnessed and inside info. PSP runs on the same circuit, but isn't the backdoor per se, which has been around for much longer.


The same way AMD was able to change the crypto algorithms for the Zen chip they licensed to China, they can change how the CPU behaves at any system, even those already deployed. This can also be used to sabotage any program or computation, making BadBIOS vastly nastier than Stuxnet.


American military made a grave mistake to partner with the morons of the Brazilian military, who are letting knowledge of this spread like a fire (and misusing it for petty profit and inside jobs to justify a police state). Israel, UK and France also have access, but are much more professional.

topic.title: INCENDIARY DEVICES ON 5G RELAY ANTENNAS
topic.body:
mc_barcelona / Friday 26 March 2021
————-
Incendiary devices placed on 5G antennas in Barcelona

One early morning in the month of March we decided to sabotage domination and technological progress by setting fire to four 5G relay antenna electrical cabinets in Barcelona; this action is a sign of solidarity with all the anarchist and subversive prisoners on hunger strike in the territories dominated by the Chilean and Greek states.

It is also a small contribution to all the revolts that have been taking place recently.

Death to the State and its domination
—————–
via: Attaque Translated Act for freedom now!

https://anarchistnews.org/content/incendiary-devices-5g-relay-antennas

topic.title: Havana Syndrome is a Threat to Forkers of ZeroNet
topic.body: Anyone working on improving ZeroNet will be targeted to death, including by being exposed to toxic levels of electromagnetic radiation. It is still worth doing it, don't let that dissuade you. 😉😼🐍☢️☣️⚠️

topic.title: App Dev Admits TikTok and his App Use Data Stolen from People's Minds
topic.body:
Author of the Randonautica app confirmed on a Livestream that both his app and TikTok are using data they steal from user's minds with hardware backdoors.

His naivety is thinking the military isn't using this for terrorism.

Short clip: https://no-cookie.kiwifarms.net/data/video/2577/2577269-d60716ac324049087b22695c24d2c00f.mp4

Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cn77LzVhous [38:50 - 42:59]

topic.title: China Stole NSA's Remote Neural Monitoring Tech and Now Spies on The Minds of All
topic.body:
Video (5 minutes) with a short description of the current state of affairs regarding brain spying with Remote Neural Monitoring by China:

Host 1: https://www.bitchute.com/video/kUIfnbFORViS/

Host 2: https://kraut.zone/w/bmaWSdr5EStn172JqKZYL4

Host 3: https://old.reddit.com/r/randonauts/comments/pxcnd3/dev_admits_tiktok_and_randonautica_use_data/

The morons in Washington kinda know, as Matthew Pottinger wrote to them: "Assembling dossiers on people has always been a feature of Leninist regimes. But Beijing’s penetration of digital networks worldwide has taken this to a new level. The party compiles dossiers on millions of foreign citizens around the world, using the material it gathers to influence and intimidate, reward and blackmail, flatter and humiliate, divide and conquer. As Bill Evanina’s written testimony today made plain, Beijing has stolen sensitive data sufficient to build a dossier on every American adult—and on many of our children, too, who are fair game under Beijing’s rules of political warfare."

https://nypost.com/2021/08/09/senate-panel-warned-china-has-enough-data-for-dossiers-on-all-americans/

1616488512_1DpTk4WVehKnzz9bhzRJ1ihCXJhmm.body:
It is a little know secret that the Israeli and American militares have backdoors to every computer and smartphone. The secret agents with access to the terminals that let one see the screen and keystrokes of any target are often corrupt criminals, thugs and themselves terrorists who instead of preventing terror attacks use their position to enrich themselves at the expense of innocents.

So to win by cheating at Magic Arena's Cash Awarding Tournaments (or any other online game, even Poker), all you got to do is enter a partnership with one of these thugs and they will give realtime access to the devices of anyone. Not for everyone, but it does happens.

Technically it isn't hacking, because the hardware leaks data to the military by design and there are no firewall logs to prove that it is happening.

(Also, it isn't unheard of accounts just being stolen and resold despite 2FA, so think twice before going all digital - specially for MTGO.)

Now you know, even if you don't believe.
Israel will go 'puff it is gone' on a nuclear 'accident', wasteland thereafter.
